articles.title: Son’s Warnie tribute is as perfect as it gets
articles.description: Jackson Warne, the son of late Aussie cricket legend Shane Warne, has celebrated what would have been his father’s 54th birthday in nearly the perfect way.
articles.content:

articles.title: Cricket Australia makes neck protectors compulsory
articles.description: Cricket Australia brings in new rules which will require batters to wear neck protectors on their helmets when facing fast or medium bowling.
articles.content:
Australia batter Steve Smith says neck protectors make him feel "claustrophobic'

articles.title: 'Stokes tees off to put rest of world on notice'
articles.description: Ben Stokes was due to be playing golf at the PGA Championship this week, instead he teed off against New Zealand and put the rest of the world on notice, says chief cricket writer Stephan Shemilt.
articles.content:
In another world, Ben Stokes was due to be playing golf this week.
